_sText:
UPDATE - install map to custom folder
...Steam\steamapps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\custom\abcd\maps

This map only for players, not multiplayer server!

Original Valve benchmark map.


Currently counter-strike source VIDEO STRESS TEST not work properly.
So I made little changes in map entities to get it work again.

Also, "fixed" sound effects what supposed to be there from the beginning.

Here what I have post before in steam forums, but that community is ridiculous hate people.
http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showpost.php?p=29663251&postcount=564
All credits to Valve. Sry for bad english.
